buyers.text: As an investor, traditional real estate investment has meant you've had to choose between having control, diversification or ROI. With Frabric there is no tradeoff. You get everything.

sellers.text: With Frabric, market liquidity is built into our system. There is no delay or restrictions to trading, nor are there any fees. Sound like a good deal? Start trading today!

holders.text: With Frabric, you have a direct say in how your property is managed, and what should be done and when. Properties are managed by the community of investors, not by a man in a suit.
